name: Free The Children
description:
Hello everyone!

Here is a project I made for school, and this is the first game I made, and it was all on my own (except for the music made by Séverin Richard)!

This is a one-button game, and you have to survive the longer you can!

Free The Children is based on Lord of the Flies, a book written by William Golding. It tells the story of children who crashed on an island and have to survive the longer they can until someone finds them. There is no adult with them so they are only on their own, they are free, but they also have to face the responsibilities that go with this freeness.

I hope you will enjoy the game!
